tweet:
massive model drop. just shipped support for elevenlabs tts, grok-video, imagen-4, and flux-2-dev.

one unified api for the best open & closed models. go build something wild.
alt_tweet:
shipping beats hype. today's merge: elevenlabs tts, grok-video, imagen-4, flux-2-dev.

all live on the platform now. what are you building with this?
image_prompt: Dynamic pixel art scene. The pollinations.ai bee mascot (round chubby yellow body, brown stripes, pink blush, blue wings) center stage, joyfully juggling glowing pixel icons: a musical note, a paintbrush, and a video film strip. Lime green (#ecf874) bursts of energy around the items. Soft pastel gradient background (mint to peach). High contrast, celebratory vibes like a level-up screen in a retro game. Warm lighting, cozy but energetic.
reasoning: Directly lists high-demand models (ElevenLabs, Grok) to grab builder attention. Reinforces the core value prop: one API for everything. Short, punchy, and action-oriented.
